CustomField.description: Possible values correspond with the standard LoggingLevel Enum: https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.apexref.meta/apexref/apex_enum_System_LoggingLevel.htm Unfortunately, picklists are not available for Custom Settings.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Possible values: NONE: No logging. ERROR: Error and exception logging. WARN: Warning logging. INFO: Informational logging. DEBUG: User-specified debug logging. FINE: High level of logging. FINER: Higher level of logging than FINE. FINEST: Highest level of logging.
CustomField.label: Threshold
